abilities.name: Energy Jump
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may move an Energy card attached to 1 of your Pokémon to another of your Pokémon. This power can't be used if Gardevoir is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Psychic Rage
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 10 damage for each damage counter on Gardevoir to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Black Magic
attacks.effect: Does 10 damage plus 20 more damage times the number of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.
